name: 3dPFM
description: Program for identifying brief BOLD events in fMRI time series using Paradigm Free Mapping
author: AFNI Developers

inputs.name: Input dataset
inputs.description: Specify the dataset to analyze (e.g., epi.nii).

inputs.name: Mask dataset
inputs.description: Process voxels inside this mask only. Default is no masking.

inputs.name: Deconvolution Algorithm
inputs.description: Regularization function used for HRF deconvolution (dantzig or lasso).

inputs.name: Model Selection Criteria
inputs.description: Model selection criterion for HRF deconvolution (BIC or AIC).

inputs.name: Non-zero coefficients
inputs.description: Choose estimate with a fixed number of nonzero coefficients.

inputs.name: Maximum Iterations
inputs.description: Maximum number of iterations in the homotopy procedure (absolute value).

inputs.name: Maximum Iterations Factor
inputs.description: Maximum number of iterations relative to the number of volumes.

inputs.name: Repetition Time (TR)
inputs.description: Repetition time or sampling period of the input data.

inputs.name: HRF Model
inputs.description: Haemodynamic response function used for deconvolution.

inputs.name: HRF Index Dataset
inputs.description: 3D dataset with voxel-dependent indexes for HRF.

inputs.name: Additional Regressors
inputs.description: Additional regressors to be fitted to the dataset.

inputs.name: Parallel Jobs
inputs.description: Number of parallel jobs to use in processing.

inputs.name: Segmentation for Progress Reporting
inputs.description: Divide into segments to report progress.

inputs.name: Verbosity Level
inputs.description: Verbosity level (0 for quiet, 1 for talkative).

output-files.name: Neuronal-related Time Series
output-files.description: Prefix for the neuronal-related (i.e. deconvolved) time series.

output-files.name: Convolved Neuronal-related Time Series
output-files.description: Prefix of the convolved neuronal-related time series.

output-files.name: Fitted Time Series
output-files.description: Prefix for the fitted time series.

output-files.name: Residuals
output-files.description: Prefix for the residuals of the fit to the data.

output-files.name: Intercept of the Model
output-files.description: Prefix for the intercept of the model.

output-files.name: LHS Parameter Estimates
output-files.description: Prefix for the estimates of the LHS parameters.

output-files.name: LHS Fitted Time Series
output-files.description: Prefix for the fitted time series of the LHS parameters.

output-files.name: Regularization Parameter
output-files.description: Prefix for output volume with the regularization parameter of the deconvolution of each voxel.

output-files.name: Cost Function Volume
output-files.description: Prefix for output volume of the cost function used to select the regularization parameter according to the selected criteria.

output-files.name: T-statistics for Beta
output-files.description: Prefix for the T-statistics of beta at each time point.

output-files.name: Degrees of Freedom for T-statistics of Beta
output-files.description: Prefix for degrees of freedom of the T-statistics of beta.

output-files.name: Z-scores of T-statistics for Beta
output-files.description: Prefix for (normalized) z-scores of the T-statistics of beta.

output-files.name: F-statistics for Beta
output-files.description: Prefix for the F-statistics of the deconvolved component.

output-files.name: Degrees of Freedom for F-statistics of Beta
output-files.description: Prefix for degrees of freedom of Fstats_beta.

output-files.name: Z-scores of F-statistics for Beta
output-files.description: Prefix for (normalized) z-scores of the Fstats_beta.

output-files.name: T-statistics for LHS Regressors
output-files.description: Prefix for T-statistics of LHS regressors at each time point.

output-files.name: Degrees of Freedom for T-statistics of LHS
output-files.description: Prefix for degrees of freedom of the Tstats_LHS.

output-files.name: Z-scores of T-statistics for LHS
output-files.description: Prefix for (normalized) z-scores of the Tstats_LHS.

output-files.name: F-statistics for LHS Regressors
output-files.description: Prefix for the F-statistics of the LHS regressors.

output-files.name: Degrees of Freedom for F-statistics of LHS
output-files.description: Prefix for degrees of freedom of Fstats_LHS.

output-files.name: Z-scores of F-statistics for LHS
output-files.description: Prefix for (normalized) z-scores of Fstats_LHS.

output-files.name: F-statistics for Full Model
output-files.description: Prefix for the F-statistics of the full model.

output-files.name: Degrees of Freedom for Full Model F-statistics
output-files.description: Prefix for degrees of freedom of Fstats_full.

output-files.name: Z-scores for Full Model F-statistics
output-files.description: Prefix for (normalized) z-scores of Fstats_full.

output-files.name: R² of Full Model
output-files.description: Prefix for R² (coefficient of determination) of the full model.

output-files.name: R² Adjusted for Full Model
output-files.description: Prefix for Adjusted R² coefficient for the full model.
